video.title: The Borgias
video.synopsis: Follow the lives of the notorious Borgia family, a clan headed by plotting patriarch Rodrigo and his beautiful but treacherous daughter, Lucrezia.

episodes.synopsis: Rodrigo Borgia bullies and bribes his way into becoming the new Pope Alexander VI.
episodes.title: The Poisoned Chalice

episodes.synopsis: The new pope wastes no time consolidating power and balancing opposition to him in the College of Cardinals by elevating his children to high office.
episodes.title: The Assassin

episodes.synopsis: His coffers depleted by his expensive rise to power, Rodrigo seeks funds through a profitable marriage for Lucrezia that will ally with him Milan.
episodes.title: The Moor

episodes.synopsis: Lucrezia's financially and politically motivated wedding to a Milanese nobleman is a disaster. Della Rovere seeks the aid of the Medici family.
episodes.title: Lucrezia's Wedding

episodes.synopsis: Neglected and abused by her cruel husband, Lucrezia has an affair with Paolo, a handsome stable boy. Cesare strikes a bargain with Machiavelli.
episodes.title: The Borgias in Love

episodes.synopsis: Della Rovere reaches France, striking a bargain with its ruler to invade Italy and install him on the Papal throne in exchange for control of Naples.
episodes.title: The French King

episodes.synopsis: The invasion by King Charles of France and Della Rovere proceeds, with victory seemingly inevitable as the French sack the Italian city of Lucca.
episodes.title: Death on a Pale Horse

episodes.synopsis: The invaders capture a fleeing and pregnant Lucrezia as they march on Rome. Pope Alexander VI waits to learn his fate as King Charles enters the city.
episodes.title: The Art of War

episodes.synopsis: Abandoned by even his cardinals, Alexander meets King Charles with humility and saves his throne. Della Rovere despairs as Charles abandons him.
episodes.title: Nessuno (Nobody)

episodes.synopsis: Pope Alexander VI throws a pagan-themed feast for the citizens of Rome and takes a new lover for himself. Cesare and Juan's hostility escalates.
episodes.title: The Borgia Bull

episodes.synopsis: Young peasant Paolo arrives in Rome to reunite with Lucrezia and to meet their child. Pope Alexander secretly visits a destitute neighborhood.
episodes.title: Paolo

episodes.synopsis: Mad with grief over Paolo's death, Lucrezia endangers herself and her son. Cesare concocts a wily scheme to fend off the army of King Charles.
episodes.title: The Beautiful Deception

episodes.synopsis: Cesare assembles a group of cutthroats to avenge the slaying of Ursula. Alexander leads a coalition of Italian forces against the marauding French.
episodes.title: Stray Dogs

episodes.synopsis: Pope Alexander tries to silence outspoken priest Savonarola, and also sends Cesare to elicit a vow of allegiance from the seductive Catherina Sforza.
episodes.title: The Choice

episodes.synopsis: Alexander schemes to marry off Lucrezia to counter his enemies' growing power. To win his father's favor, Cesare steals a shipment of Medici gold.
episodes.title: Day of Ashes

episodes.synopsis: Pope Alexander appoints Juan to lead a siege against the castle of Catherina Sforza. Lucrezia undermines her father's attempts to marry her off.
episodes.title: The Siege at Forli

episodes.synopsis: Juan tries to obfuscate his cowardice during the siege of Forli. Della Rovere's plot to assassinate Pope Alexander nears fruition.
episodes.title: Truth and Lies

episodes.synopsis: Opium-addled Juan endangers Giovanni and faces the consequences of his reckless life. Assassin Antonello has his opportunity to strike.
episodes.title: World of Wonders

episodes.synopsis: Lucrezia falls in love with a new suitor. Cesare confesses to killing Juan. Antonello succeeds in getting Alexander to drink the poisoned wine...
episodes.title: The Confession

episodes.synopsis: As Pope Alexander fights for his life after being poisoned, the cardinals jockey for position to take over the papacy.
episodes.title: The Face of Death

episodes.synopsis: Alexander tasks Cardinal Sforza with instigating an "inquisition" among the cardinals. Catherina Sforza seeks support from mercenary warlords.
episodes.title: The Purge

episodes.synopsis: As the purged cardinals are dismissed and stripped of their titles and wealth, Cardinal Versucci sets the Vatican treasury on fire.
episodes.title: Siblings

episodes.synopsis: Newly appointed Cardinal Farnese discovers Cardinal Versucci's theft, and Micheletto is sent to find him. Alexander calls for a crusade.
episodes.title: The Banquet of Chestnuts

episodes.synopsis: Cesare's diplomatic mission to France is a success. King Ferdinand is determined to not have Giovanni recognized at court.
episodes.title: The Wolf and the Lamb

episodes.synopsis: When Cesare lands in northern Italy with a French army, Alexander reluctantly accedes to Cesare's plan to destroy the Sforza dynasty.
episodes.title: Relics

episodes.synopsis: Cesare burns Constanzo's palace in order to contain the plague, while Lucrezia seeks a Neapolitan power base for herself and her family.
episodes.title: Lucrezia's Gambit

episodes.synopsis: Catherina Sforza seeks to ruin Alexander's lucrative jubilee in Rome. Meanwhile, Lucrezia senses a change in newly crowned Frederigo.
episodes.title: Tears of Blood

episodes.synopsis: Devastated by his betrayal by Pascal, Micheletto disappears. Cesare races to Naples to rescue Lucrezia, but she has already escaped her captors.
episodes.title: The Gunpowder Plot

episodes.synopsis: Alexander and Cesare reconcile at last. The pope reveals that the papal armies have been strengthened. Cesare marches on Catherina Sforza's castle.
episodes.title: The Prince
